pkgmetadata.longdescription: resources for genetics of gene expression based on Cheung et al 2010 // Data resources related to the PLoS Biology paper Polymorphic Cis- and Trans-Regulation of Human Gene Expression, including small-footprint smlSet support for 147 hgfocus arrays and corresponding HapMap genotypes at 1.3 million SNP; 0.0.22+ includes cheung_eset... from Leek et al RECOUNT myrna output
